items.title: The Warner Bros. Curse
items.description: Warner Bros. has a history of disastrous mergers and acquisitions. Can they avoid another bad sequel as Netflix and Paramount battle to buy it?

items.title: Built to spill: The life of a crash test dummy
items.description: Automotive crash test dummies are born in Ohio, brought to "life" near Detroit, and then sent around the world to make cars safer.
